name: flat-er
description: Flattens nested js objects to one level

scripts.cond-install: if [ ! -d node_modules ]; then npm i; fi;
scripts.build: npm run cond-install && npx webpack --mode production && sudo cp src/index.d.ts dist/index.d.ts
scripts.postversion: git add . && git commit --amend && git push
scripts.rm-dev-deps: cp package.json package.json.bak && cat package.json.bak | jq -rc '.devDependencies = {}' > package.json
scripts.pub: npm run rm-dev-deps && npm publish && cp package.json.bak package.json

author: Adam Monica
